name: Rain Storm LCD
description:
Just as you finish hanging out your laundry.. a rain storm has started. Don't let the rain get your shirts wet! Move the clothes lines so that the rain drops miss your shirts. Each rain drop missed scores a point.

FEATURES:
- Insane clothes line moving action.
- High score leaderboard in Game Center.
- Rain drops, shirts, clothes lines, birds and dogs.
- Zoom option.
- Full screen mode.
- Support for external controllers.
